name: reddit-submission-finder
title: Reddit Submission Finder
description: Extension to find previous reddit submissions of the current page
author: ntv1000

preferences.name: openLinkDefaultLocation
preferences.title: Action when submission title is clicked
preferences.description: The location at which a submission will be opened when its title is clicked.

preferences.name: hideOpenOptions
preferences.title: Hide options for opening submissions
preferences.description: When checked, the hover-options for submission will be hidden.
